text: Ara yakhana sudrsya kare dila sayatana tadera drstite tadera karyakalapake ebam balala ye, ajakera dine kona manusa'i tomadera upara bijayi hate parabe na ara ami halama tomadera samarthaka, atahpara yakhana samanasamani hala ubhaya bahini takhana se ati druta paye pechane dike paliye gela ebam balala, ami tomadera sathe na-ami dekhachi, ya tomara dekhacha na; ami bhaya kari allahake. Ara allahara ayaba atyanta kathina.
